extendedInfo.description: Beautiful High Fashion Luxury Polka Dot Theme. Simple, sexy, luxurious. Red & White polka dots accented with diamonds and a black technical pattern. Made for Go SMS Pro. Also available in 2 other color combinations:Pink & White Polka Dotshttp://goo.gl/9gUbnPurple & White Polka Dotshttp://goo.gl/oXxPyâ Custom made design from top to bottomâ Bold red & white polka dot backgroundâ Black studded tech pattern on the top and bottomâ Cute and luxurious matching popup chat windowâ 2 crisp chat bubbles, one red and one blackâ 2 different custom backgrounds for messaging and conversation views â Customized text colors for all GO SMS screensâ 33 circular red application icons to match the themeâ This theme is designed to be completely cute and awesome but still make it easy to read your messages, enjoy!â Theme can be stored on your SD CardAbout Go SMS Pro:GO SMS PRO brings you cool UI, fast and convenient SMS/MMS experience. GO SMS Pro is the most popular messaging app; Very powerful, Cool, Funny, Safe, Fully customizable; Well support SMS/MMS + GO Chat(free message) + Walkie Talkie(free voice). MUST HAVE. Search GO SMS, install it if you don't have have it. Then...To apply theme:Open GO SMS Pro > press Menu > Themes > Dot Chic > ApplyIf you enjoy the theme let me know in the ratings, thank you!To support the time spent creating and customizing our themes this free version periodically presents Airpush advertisements in your notification bar and/or icons. *** Any problems, feedback, or requests just email support@jellytap.com, we like hearing from the people using our themes! ***Thanks for your interest in our designs!Keywords: go sms pro, red theme, black theme, polka dot theme, luxury theme, fun theme, cute theme, girly theme, diamonds theme
